title: The Disappearance of Madeleine McCann
fullTitle: The Disappearance of Madeleine McCann (TV Series 2019–2019)
plot: The Disappearance of Madeleine McCann takes a detailed look at the disappearance of three-year-old Madeleine McCann, who vanished from the seaside resort of Praia de Luz in Portugal, while on holiday with her family.
stars: Anthony Summers, Maria João Vaz, Gonçalo Amaral
